name: QX 2001
overview: QX 2001 is a timed sci-fi arcade game. As a robot operator the player must find all parts of the indicated item (f.e. access card, transmitter) scattered around the base in order to get access to the next level. QX may shoot horizontally and vertically. The base is full of alien flying objects, turrets, laser barriers and robots. Contact with them means a loss of energy, which can't be supplemented. The game features 3 levels.
